entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
